resps: Delivered over 7 professional websites using HTML5, CSS3 (including SCSS and BEM), JavaScript, and React best practices.
Improved website performance by 40% through image compression, caching, and lazy loading of components, which led to a 20% decrease in page load times.
Included SEO, responsive, multi-platform, accessibility and hosting support, enabling their website to be used by any browser or device in the world.

Processed API requests with Axios to dynamically fetch and represent data from a cloud server, implementing skeleton loading states, pagination, and dynamic routing, which improved page load times by 23% and reduced bounce rate by 12%.
Supported 100+ students learning web technologies including HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript ES6/7, Firebase, and React.
Taught advanced coding concepts like responsive web development, API requests, and programming best practices such as utilizing dev tools to debug.
Provided constructive feedback and code reviews to help students improve their coding skills and address areas of improvement.
Utilized Git version control and the GitHub interface to manage 15 branches, ensuring smooth collaboration in a virtual team environment.
Collaborated with other mentors to develop and refine the curriculum, ensuring it stays current with the latest trends and technologies in Frontend development.
Facilitated group discussions and coding challenges to promote a collaborative and engaging learning environment.
